mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Marone, Michael Patient Age: 35. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left arm. Location Wounded: In action at Wytheville, VA. Date Wounded: 1865/05/10. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Discharged from service.
